name: Drake's Crude
description: In 1859 Col. Edwin L. Drake successfully drilled the first oil well in Northwest Pennsylvania. Because of the project known as "Drake's Folly," Pennsylvania was actually responsible for almost half of the world's oil production until the 1901 oil boom in Texas. Erie Brewing Co. reflects on our regions oil history and oil rush by producing a crude oil Black, silky smooth, malt bonanza oatmeal stout.
